official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 1,3-Isobenzofurandione, 5,5'-sulfonylbis-, polymer with 4,4'-methylenebis[2,6-dimethylbenzenamine].

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 1,3-Isobenzofurandione, 5,5'-sulfonylbis-, polymer with 4,4'-methylenebis[2,6-dimethylbenzenamine].

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 1,3-Isobenzofurandione, 5,5'-sulfonylbis-, polymer with 4,4'-methylenebis[2,6-dimethylbenzenamine].
